content: lollygag instructions provisionally cast on 72 stitches place beginning of round marker and begin knitting in the round with mc set-up round with mc knit all stitches section 1 round 1-4 with cc knit all stitches materials round 5 with mc k2 *lollygag stitch k3 repeat from * to yarn 2 stitches before marker lollygag stitch k1 mc 1 skein worsted merino by plymouth round 6 with mc knit all stitches yarns 100g/218yds round 7-10 with cc knit all stitches cc 1 skein merino+ color by lang round 11 with mc *lollygag stitch k3 repeat from * to end of 100g/200yds round needles us7 - 16 round 12 with mc knit all stitches notions darning needle stitch marker repeat rounds 1-12 until you ve knit 10 repeats or you ve used gauge & size just about 1/2 of your yarn remaining yarn should weight 100 grams combined or a bit more end your last repeat having finished 18 sts & 30 row = 4 in stitch pattern round 11 you won t knit round 12 8 wide x 28 circ section 2 repeat section 1 swapping mc and cc you ll start next round a bbreviations with round 1 and mc k=knit repeat rounds 1 12 until you ve knit 8 repeats or you have just a mc=main color few yards left of cc end your last repeat having finished round cc=contrasting color 11 lollygag stitch = with right needle pick up the right leg of remove provisional cast on placing stitches on spare needle graft the 4th stitch below the next 72 stitches with kitchener stitch using cc stitch on the left needle put that picked-up stitch onto the left needle and knit it next drop the first stitch off the left needle and let it drop down rev 11/14 darnknitanyway com ©2023 darn knit anyway all rights reserved this is a free pattern stillwater mn we hope you make beautiful knit items for yourself or your loved ones 651 342 1386
